data.body:
Objective: Implement OpenRouter API integration for model discovery and pricing data.

Notes: Depends on wave 1. Client/parser/tests can run in parallel; routes depend on client primitives.

Assigned tasks:
- Create OpenRouter API client module
- Normalize OpenRouter model metadata and pricing
- Add cached models endpoint for Settings UI
- Add OpenRouter connectivity-check endpoint
- Add unit tests for OpenRouter client and parsers

data.title: Scene foster-uncut: Provider Backend
